name: Attaque
note:
<setup action>
display action
</setup action>

<Target Action>
move user: target, front, 10
motion swing: user
wait for animation
action effect
perform action
</Target Action>

name: Garde
note:
Compétence #2 sera utilisée lorsque
vous sélectionnerez la commande Garde.

name: Attaque Consécutive
note:
<setup action>
Display Action
PERFORM START
</setup action>
 
<Target Action>
move user: target, front, 10 
attack animation: target
enemy effect: target, blink
motion swing: user
wait for movement
perform action
wait for animation
action effect: target
death break
perform finish
</Target Action>

 
<finish action>
PERFORM FINISH
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
</finish action>

description:
Saute sur l'adversaire et lui inflige
de lourds dégats.
name: Piqué du Dragon
note:
<Cooldown: 2>
<setup action>
Display Action
PERFORM START
</setup action>
<target action> 
camera focus: user 
flash screen: white, 15
wait: 10
move user: forward, 48, 12 
opacity not focus: 0, 20 
wait for opacity 
float user: 600%, 10 
wait for float 
opacity user: 0%, 5 
wait for opacity 
move user: target, center, 10
ZOOM: 120%, 5
wait for movement 
opacity user: 100%, 5 
wait for opacity 
float user: 0%, 8  
SE: Earth5
shake screen
motion swing: user
action animation: target
perform action
death break
shake screen: 3, 9, 10 
ani wait: 5 
action effect 
immortal: target, false 
Wait 30 
reset zoom: 10 
reset camera: 10 
jump user: 200%, 10 
move user: home, 5 
face user: forward 
wait for animation 
wait for movement 
</target action> 

<follow action> 
zoom: 100%, 60 
opacity not focus: 100%, 60 
wait for opacity

</follow action>

name: Tir
note:
<setup action>
Display Action
PERFORM START
</setup action>
 
<Target Action>
attack animation: target
enemy effect: target, blink
perform action
action effect: target
death break
perform finish
</Target Action>

 
<finish action>
PERFORM FINISH
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
</finish action>

description: Draine les HP de la cible.
name: Flèche vampirique
note:
<Cooldown: 1>
<setup action>
Display Action
PERFORM START
</setup action>
 
<Target Action>
motion missile: user
attack animation: target
enemy effect: target, blink
action animation: target
perform action
<HP Life Steal: 100%>
wait for animation
action effect: target
death break
perform finish
</Target Action>

 
<finish action>
PERFORM FINISH
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
</finish action>

name: Cross Strike
note:
<Cooldown: 2>
<setup action>
Display Action
PERFORM START
</setup action>

<Target Action>
ZOOM: 120%, 5
move user: target, front center, 5
wait for movement
motion swing: user
move user: target, back, 5
motion swing: user
wait for movement
attack animation: target
action effect
wait: 10
move user: target, back head, 5
motion swing: user
wait for movement
wait: 10
move user: target, front base, 5
motion swing: user
wait for movement
attack animation: target, mirror
action effect
wait: 10
move user: target, front head, 5
motion swing: user
wait for movement
wait: 10
move user: target, back base, 5
motion swing: user
wait for movement
attack animation: target
action effect
wait: 10
move user: target, back center, 5
wait for movement
wait: 5
move user: target, front center, 5
motion swing: user
wait for movement
attack animation: target, mirror
action effect
wait: 20
</Target Action>
<finish action>
move user: home, 30
face user: forward
motion evade: user
jump user: 250%, 30
wait for movement
show battle hud
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
clear battle log
</finish action>

description:
Assomme l'ennemi pendant 2 à 3 tours.
Les dégats peuvent retirer l'état.
name: Charge
note:
<Cooldown: 1>
<setup action>
Display Action
PERFORM START
</setup action>
 
<Target Action>
move user: target, front, 10 
action animation
enemy effect: target, blink
move user: target, center, 5
wait for movement
wait: 5
move user: target, front center, 5
motion guard: user
wait for movement
action effect: target
death break
perform finish
</Target Action>

name: Tempête de lames
note:
<setup action>
display action
</setup action>

<Target Action>
move user: target, front, 4
motion swing: user
show animation 126: target
action effect
perform action
</Target Action>

<finish action>
move user: home, 30
face user: forward
motion evade: user
jump user: 250%, 30
wait for movement
show battle hud
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
clear battle log
</finish action>

name: Attaque du raptor
note:
<setup action>
display action
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
jump user: 200%, 20
else
perform start
end
zoom: 120%, 20
camera screen: target, front center, 20
camera focus: target, front center, 20
wait:160
motion attack: user
show animation 7: target
wait for animation
action effect
move user: targets, back, 10
face user: backward
motion attack: user
show animation 7: target
wait for animation
action effect
wait: 5
jump user: 200%, 20
move user: targets, front, 20
wait: 10
motion attack: user
show animation 7: target
wait for animation
action effect
float user: 0%
</target action>
<finish action>
move user: home, 30
face user: forward
motion evade: user
jump user: 250%, 30
wait for movement
show battle hud
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
clear battle log
</finish action>
